name: make-reducer
description: Functions to easily build redux reducers without boilerplate code.

scripts.coverage: babel-node -r node_modules/isparta/lib/cli cover --root src --include-all-sources --report html --report json node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- test
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run codecov

author: Sergey Todyshev <stodyshev@gmail.com>
